title: DAY ONE
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Atut!
lines.translation: Asset!
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Od Produktu nie wróciłem do domu bez zrobienia se z kimś selfie
lines.translation: Since Product I haven't returned home without taking a selfie with someone
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: A nie zawsze mam fit LV, i nieskończoność energii
lines.translation: And I don't always have fit LV, and endless energy
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Wiem, że wygoda jest wrogiem sukcesu
lines.translation: I know that comfort is the enemy of success
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Co mi po tej willi na tym Airbnb?
lines.translation: What do I need this villa on this Airbnb for?
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Najlepsze numery robiłem na trapie
lines.translation: I did my best tricks on the gangplank.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Jak chcę zrobić papier to śpię na kanapie, baby
lines.translation: If I want to make paper, I sleep on the couch, baby
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Opiłem się trochę już wody sodowej i sobie nią bekam jak David (David)
lines.translation: I've already had some soda and I'm burping it like David.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Opowiem Ci jak się utrzymasz na topie
lines.translation: I'll tell you how to stay on top
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Choć szanse są slim jak Shady (Shady)
lines.translation: Though the odds are slim as Shady (Shady)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Na tracku masz Poland's finest, Taco i Oki jak Biggie jak Jay-Z
lines.translation: On the track you have Poland's finest, Taco and Oki like Biggie like Jay-Z
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zapraszam do stołu i zanim zagramy Ci powiem zasady tej gierki
lines.translation: I invite you to the table and before we play, I will tell you the rules of this game.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada pierwsza — pierwszy hit i się grono zagęszcza
lines.translation: Rule one – the first hit and the crowd grows
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: W furze brakuje miejsca, więc już się busem przemieszczasz
lines.translation: There's not enough space in the van, so you're already traveling by bus.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Będziesz miał pierwszy leak i zerwany film na backstage'ach
lines.translation: You will have the first leak and broken film on backstage
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Uważaj na social media i patrz kto robi Ci zdjęcia
lines.translation: Be careful on social media and watch who takes your photos
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada druga — nie idź do celu po trupach
lines.translation: Rule two - don't walk over dead bodies to your destination
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Nie opierdalaj produkcji, że nie smakuje Ci zupa
lines.translation: Don't criticize the production if you don't like the soup.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Na planie klipu płacze stylistka, make-upistka Cię wkurwia
lines.translation: On the set of the video, the stylist is crying, the makeup artist is pissing you off
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Po paru burdach kręcisz sam, nie masz kogo zatrudniać
lines.translation: After a few fights, you're on your own, you have no one to hire
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada trzecia — nie jesteś z ulic tylko z przedmieścia
lines.translation: Rule three - you're not from the streets, you're from the suburbs
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Więc nie nawijaj o Roadmanach i shooterach w tych wersach (po-po-po)
lines.translation: So don't talk about Roadmen and shooters in these lines (po-po-po)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Porównując sceny, my chodzimy w Pampersach
lines.translation: Comparing scenes, we are walking around in Pampers
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Ciągle nawijasz o oppsach (mówimy tu o tych chłopcach?)
lines.translation: You keep going on about opps (are we talking about those boys here?)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Następnie zasada piąta — mordo, przeczytaj ten kontrakt
lines.translation: Then rule five – dude, read this contract
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Wiem, że jest długi, a już chcesz mieć tę zaliczkę na kontach
lines.translation: I know it's long, and you already want to have that advance on your accounts
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Dziś nawet label independent ma praktyki z majorsa
lines.translation: Nowadays, even independent labels have experience with majors.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Wszystko wydałeś na pendant, potem pytasz, "Gdzie forsa?" (Let's go!)
lines.translation: You spent it all on a pendant, then you ask, "Where's the money?" (Let's go!)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Twoje day one'y, Twoje day one'y Cię zostawią
lines.translation: Your day ones, your day ones will leave you
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Pusty backstage jak już będziesz mniej znany (pojebane)
lines.translation: Empty backstage once you're less known (fucked up)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Dziś są Gucci glasses, a nie Ray-bany
lines.translation: Today it's Gucci glasses, not Ray-Bans
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Każdy jest wydripowany, miało być na dom dla mamy, lecz (ej)
lines.translation: Everyone is dripping, it was supposed to be for a house for my mom, but (hey)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Twoje day one'y, Twoje day one'y Cię zostawią
lines.translation: Your day ones, your day ones will leave you
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Pusty backstage jak już będziesz mniej znany (pojebane)
lines.translation: Empty backstage once you're less known (fucked up)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Dziś są Gucci glasses, a nie Ray-bany
lines.translation: Today it's Gucci glasses, not Ray-Bans
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Każdy jest wydripowany, miało być na dom dla mamy, lecz
lines.translation: Everyone is dripping, it was supposed to be for a house for my mom, but
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada numer six — nie wydaj fortuny na drip
lines.translation: Rule number six - don't spend a fortune on drip
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Nie płać im sumy za feat, jak i tak w sumie jest mid
lines.translation: Don't pay them a fortune for the feat, it's basically mid anyway
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Jak żądasz duży plik, bierzesz hajsy grube za geek
lines.translation: If you demand a large file, you get big bucks for geek
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: To chociaż nawiń coś na żywo, tak nie umie już nikt
lines.translation: At least say something live, no one can do that anymore
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada ósma — weź się nie podpisuj na biustach
lines.translation: Rule eight - don't sign your breasts
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Ej, stary, zrobiłem to raz, wiem, widziałem na grupkach
lines.translation: Hey man, I did it once, I know, I saw it on groups
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Nie bierz tych groupies na hotel, nie lej im wódy do kubka
lines.translation: Don't take these groupies to the hotel, don't pour vodka into their cup
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Strzel fotę, sklej pionę, no i powiedz jej, "Good luck"
lines.translation: Take a photo, glue the piece together, and tell her, "Good luck!"
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Number nine should've been number one to me
lines.translation: Number nine should've been number one to me
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Tutaj każdy chce Cię przyciąć, więc negocjuj fit
lines.translation: Here everyone wants to trim you, so negotiate fit
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: I to jasne, każdy z nas chce być jak ODB
lines.translation: And it's clear, each of us wants to be like ODB
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Ale jak budujesz funbase, daj im show za free
lines.translation: But if you're building a funbase, give them a show for free.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: I zasada dziesięć — szanuj fanów kieszeń
lines.translation: And rule ten - respect your fans' pockets
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Nie-nie-nie wydawaj byle czego, nie kuś tanim merchem
lines.translation: No-no-don't spend just anything, don't tempt with cheap merchandise
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Bo Cię kochają, wezmą wszystko, co im wpadnie w ręcę
lines.translation: Because they love you, they will take anything they can get their hands on.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Będzie Ci głupio wozić dupę dojebanym Benzem, wuh
lines.translation: You'll feel bad driving around in a shitty Benz, wuh
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Twoje day one'y, Twoje day one'y Cię zostawią
lines.translation: Your day ones, your day ones will leave you
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Pusty backstage jak już będziesz mniej znany (pojebane)
lines.translation: Empty backstage once you're less known (fucked up)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Dziś są Gucci glasses, a nie Ray-bany
lines.translation: Today it's Gucci glasses, not Ray-Bans
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Każdy jest wydripowany, miało być na dom dla mamy, lecz (ej)
lines.translation: Everyone is dripping, it was supposed to be for a house for my mom, but (hey)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Twoje day one'y, Twoje day one'y Cię zostawią
lines.translation: Your day ones, your day ones will leave you
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Pusty backstage jak już będziesz mniej znany (pojebane)
lines.translation: Empty backstage once you're less known (fucked up)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Dziś są Gucci glasses, a nie Ray-bany
lines.translation: Today it's Gucci glasses, not Ray-Bans
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Każdy jest wydripowany, miało być na dom dla mamy, lecz
lines.translation: Everyone is dripping, it was supposed to be for a house for my mom, but
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada czwarta — jak dobrego masz Day One'a masz farta
lines.translation: Rule Four - If you have a good Day One, you're lucky
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Lecz sprawdź czy jest z tobą zawsze, czy tylko gdy lejesz szampan
lines.translation: But check if he is always with you or only when you pour champagne.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Czy jak powierzysz tajemnice nie wyśpiewa jak Sampha
lines.translation: If you tell him your secrets, won't he sing like Sampha?
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Gdy się zacznie wycofywać, niech zapali się lampka
lines.translation: When he starts to retreat, let the light go on
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Zasada siódma — pamiętaj, branża bywa okrutna
lines.translation: Rule Seven - Remember, the industry can be cruel
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Czasami przyjaźń jest piękna, czasami przyjaźń jest złudna
lines.translation: Sometimes friendship is beautiful, sometimes friendship is illusory
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Nie warto wsadzać wszystkich naraz do tego samego pudła
lines.translation: It's not worth putting everyone in the same box at once.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Nie każdy day one jest złotem, nie każdy obcy to kurwa
lines.translation: Not every day one is gold, not every stranger is a whore
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.
